title: Sound On: President Biden Signs Infrastructure Bill
itunes:title: Sound On: President Biden Signs Infrastructure Bill
description:
Guests: Congressman Ruben Gallego, representative for Arizona's 7th congressional district, Jeanne Sheehan Zaino, Professor at Iona College and Bloomberg Contributor, Rick Davis, Bloomberg Contributor and Partner at Stonecourt Capital, and Euan Rellie, Co-Founder and Managing Partner of BDA Partners.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
